seo.metaTitle: Professional Epoxy Floor Coating - Springfield MA | Garage & Basement Floors
seo.metaDescription: Transform your garage and basement floors with professional epoxy coating. Serving Springfield MA area. Free quotes, 10-year warranty, expert installation.

hero.headline: Transform Your Floors with Professional Epoxy Coating
hero.subheadline: Durable, beautiful floors that resist stains, chemicals, and daily wear. Serving Springfield MA and surrounding areas with expert installation and 10-year warranty.

children.text: Why Choose Professional Epoxy Floor Coating?

Professional epoxy floor coating transforms ordinary concrete into a stunning, durable surface that resists stains, chemicals, and daily wear. Unlike DIY kits that often fail within 1-2 years, our professional installation includes proper surface preparation, premium materials, and expert application techniques that ensure lasting results.

• Garage Floor Epoxy Coating - Starting at $4.50/sq ft
• Basement Floor Resurfacing - Starting at $5.25/sq ft
• Commercial Floor Coating
• Concrete Crack Repair
• Decorative Color Options
• 10-Year Warranty on All Installations

title: About Our Epoxy Floor Coating Company

seo.metaTitle: About Our Epoxy Floor Company - Expert Installation Springfield MA
seo.metaDescription: Learn about our professional epoxy floor coating company. Expert installers serving Springfield MA with 15+ years experience and hundreds of satisfied customers.

hero.headline: Expert Epoxy Floor Installation Since 2008
hero.subheadline: Family-owned business with 15+ years of experience transforming garages and basements throughout the Springfield MA area.

children.text: We started our epoxy floor coating business in 2008 with a simple mission: provide homeowners with professional-quality floor coating that lasts. After seeing too many customers disappointed with failed DIY epoxy kits, we knew there was a better way.

• 15+ years of specialized experience in epoxy floor coating
• Proper surface preparation using professional diamond grinding equipment
• Premium 100% solids epoxy - not water-based coatings
• 10-year warranty on all installations
• Local Springfield MA area business
• Over 500 satisfied customers
• Fully licensed and insured
We proudly serve Springfield MA and the surrounding communities including Westfield, Chicopee, Holyoke, Northampton, East Longmeadow, and areas within 50 miles of Springfield.
